p: The binding energy of the selected candidates ranged from -6.3 to -6.1 kcal/mol for β 1 and from -6.5 to -6 kcal/mol for β 2, and from 6.2 kcal/mol to 6 kcal/mol for β 5, with all three molecules having higher energy than carfilzomib (-5.2 kcal/mol) for the three targets, as shown in ( Table 2). The resulting molecule, all three compounds, had a greater affinity with the active site of β 1, β 2, and β 5.
